name: Better Menu
description: This mod is used for a better menu for the game. This Mod aim is to have a better experience on the menus

RunMainMenu.name: Main Menu Modifications
RunMainMenu.description: This settings Enables the main menu (Note: This will be for other menus when i am finished)

EnableExitGameButton.name: Exit Button
EnableExitGameButton.description: Makes the game be able to close

HideName.name: Hide Username
HideName.description: This setting Hides the players name from the main menu

RightSide.name: Right Menu to Shortcuts
RightSide.description: Moves the right menu near the Shortcuts

ShortcutMyLevel.name: My Levels Shortcut
ShortcutMyLevel.description: Adds my Levels to the Shortcuts location

ShortcutSavedLevels.name: Saved levels Shortcut
ShortcutSavedLevels.description: Adds saved Levels to the Shortcuts location

ShortcutSearch.name: Search Shortcut
ShortcutSearch.description: Removes More games and replaces it with Search button
